Message:
My lord arranged for me
to perform in a small plaza.

The audience is a bit lacking
compared to when I was
dancing in the bar...

...but it’s still nice to
dance in front of others.
It sure has been a while...

Though for some reason,
I’m supposed to dance
with that cat-girl...

There’s still so much
I haven’t taught her.

I’ll use this opportunity to
give her another crash course.

I’m only doing this so
you don’t embarrass me...
If you make such a happy face...

it’s only going to make
things harder...
